products.name: Natural Creamy Peanut Butter Spread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Legumes and their products,Fats,Spreads,Nuts and their products,Plant-based spreads,Vegetable fats,Oilseed purees,Legume butters,Nut butters,Peanut butters
products.labels: No gluten,No GMOs,No preservatives,Non GMO project,Verified
products.facts: ["Made from 100% natural peanuts with no added sugars or preservatives.","Contains healthy fats and protein, making it a nutritious choice.","The production process prioritizes sustainability by sourcing peanuts from eco-friendly farms.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact."]

products.name: Oreo (Chocolate Sandwich Cookies)
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Filled biscuits, Chocolate sandwich cookies
products.facts: ["Oreo cookies are made with a combination of sugar, unbleached enriched flour, cocoa, and palm and/or canola oil.","Oreo packaging is designed to be recyclable, and the brand is working towards reducing its environmental impact.","Oreo cookies are certified as vegan in many countries, as they do not contain any animal-derived ingredients.","The quality of Oreo cookies is maintained through strict quality control measures, ensuring consistency in taste and texture."]

products.name: Natural Chunky Peanut Butter
products.facts: ["Made from 100% roasted peanuts with no added sugars or oils.","Contains high levels of protein and healthy fats, promoting a balanced diet.","Sustainably sourced peanuts, supporting local farming communities and reducing environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives, ensuring a natural and wholesome product."]

products.name: Great value, creamy peanut butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Made with roasted peanuts and salt, ensuring a rich flavor.","Contains no hydrogenated oils, promoting healthier fat content.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Quality tested for consistency and taste, providing a creamy texture."]

products.name: Wild Sardines In Extra Virgin Olive Oil
products.categories: Seafood,Fishes and their products,Canned foods,Fishes,Fatty fishes,Canned fishes,Sardines,Canned sardines,Sardines in oil,Sardines in olive oil
products.labels: Kosher,Orthodox Union Kosher,Pareve,Sustainably caught, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Wild sardines are sourced from sustainable fisheries, ensuring minimal impact on marine ecosystems.","Packed in high-quality extra virgin olive oil, which is rich in antioxidants and healthy fats.","Sardines are a good source of omega-3 fatty acids, promoting heart health and reducing inflammation.","The product is free from artificial preservatives and additives, maintaining its natural flavor and nutritional value."]

products.name: Milk
products.categories: Dairies, Milks (liquid and powder), Milks, Lactose-free milk, en:semi-skimmed-milks
products.facts: ["Milk is typically packaged in recyclable plastic or carton containers, reducing waste.","The production of milk has a lower carbon footprint compared to many other animal-based products.","Milk is a rich source of calcium and vitamin D, contributing to bone health.","Quality milk is often tested for antibiotic residues and bacterial contamination to ensure safety."]

products.name: Dessert pâtissier. Fraisier
products.packaging: Métal, Plastique, Carton, Frais, Etui en carton, Opercule en métal, Opercule métal et étui carton à recycler, Pot en plastique, Pot plastique à jeter, pot
products.facts: ["Made with fresh strawberries and cream, providing a rich taste and natural sweetness.","Utilizes high-quality ingredients, ensuring a premium dessert experience.","Eco-friendly practices are often employed in sourcing local strawberries, reducing carbon footprint.","Typically crafted with minimal preservatives, promoting a healthier dessert option."]

products.name: Macédoine de légumes
products.facts: ["Made from a mix of fresh, seasonal vegetables including carrots, peas, and green beans.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","No artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","Produced in compliance with strict food safety standards to guarantee freshness and quality."]

products.name: Dairylea processed cheese-portions regular
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Cheeses
products.facts: ["Dairylea processed cheese-portions are made from a blend of cheese, milk, and emulsifiers.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","Dairylea products are often fortified with vitamins such as Vitamin D and calcium for added nutritional value.","The cheese is made without artificial preservatives, ensuring a higher quality product."]

products.name: Quick 1-Minute Oats imp
products.labels: Kosher, No artificial flavors, No preservatives, Orthodox Union Kosher, 100% Whole Grain, American Heart Association Certified, en:non-gmo-project
products.facts: ["Quick 1-Minute Oats are made from whole grain oats, providing a good source of fiber and nutrients.","The oats are processed in a way that minimizes environmental impact, often using sustainable farming practices.","These oats are packaged in recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendly disposal.","Quality is ensured through rigorous testing for purity and freshness, adhering to food safety standards."]

products.name: Perfectly Crafted Thick Sliced Multigrain
products.ingredients_text: unbleached enriched flour (wheat flour, malted barley flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamin mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), water, sugar, yeast, contains 2% or less of each of the following: soybean oil, sprouted wheat grains, brown sugar, salt, flax seed, millet, sunflower seeds, wheat gluten, whole oat groats, sprouted rye grains, cultured wheat flour, dried molasses, fermented wheat flour, cracked wheat, sprouted triticale grains, fermented rye flour, calcium sulfate, sunflower lecithin, vinegar, enzymes, monocalcium phosphate, ascorbic acid, soy lecithin,
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Flours, Cereal flours, Breads, Wheat flours, Bread flours, Sliced breads, Wheat bread flour
products.facts: ["Made with a blend of whole grains including oats, barley, and wheat.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Sourced from sustainable farms that practice eco-friendly agriculture.","Rich in fiber and protein, promoting a healthy diet."]

products.name: Marinara Sauce
products.ingredients_text: Italian Whole Peeled Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Onions, Salt, Garlic, Basil, Black Pepper, Oregano.
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Groceries, en:pasta-sauces
products.facts: ["Made primarily from tomatoes, garlic, onions, and herbs.","Typically contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Often uses sustainably sourced ingredients to reduce environmental impact.","Quality marinara sauce is usually slow-cooked to enhance flavor and texture."]

products.name: Cheerios
products.ingredients_text: whole grain oats, corn starch, sugar, salt, tripotassium phosphate, vitamin e (mixed tocopherols) (added to preserve freshness), calcium carbonate, iron, zinc, vitamin c (sodium ascorbate), a b vitamin (niacinamide), vitamin be (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin a (palmitate), vitamin b, (thiamin mononitrate), a b vitamin (folic acid), vitamin b12, vitamin d3.
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, extruded cereals
products.facts: ["Cheerios are made primarily from whole grain oats, which are a good source of fiber.","The packaging for Cheerios is recyclable, promoting better ecological practices.","Cheerios are produced without artificial flavors or colors, ensuring a quality product.","The oats used in Cheerios are sourced from sustainable farms, supporting eco-friendly agriculture."]
